abstract: A day of mixed signals that revealed a breakdown in communication between Mrs. Bachmann and her New Hampshire staff.
snippet: A day of mixed signals that revealed a breakdown in communication between Mrs. Bachmann and her New Hampshire staff.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 4:50 p.m. Jeff Chidester, the New Hampshire campaign manager for Representative Michele Bachmann, confirmed Friday afternoon that he was leaving the campaign, capping an unusual day of mixed signals that revealed a breakdown in communication between Mrs. Bachmann and her New Hampshire staff.

headline.main: Bachmann’s N.H. Campaign Manager Confirms He Is Leaving
